To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Marubozu _marubozu;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_marubozu = Marubozu(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_marubozu.IsReady)
{
    var current = _marubozu.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.marubozu = self.Marubozu(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.marubozu.IsReady:
    current = self.marubozu.Current.Value
